logistic.R: Campaign backlog for Metaquest: manuscript checkpoints, outreach cadence, endorsements, simulator demos.
logistic.Theta: Checkpoints from Manuskriptfinalisierung pdf + UTAC status matrix echoed in codexfeedback.
logistic.zeta: Soothed when BreakPoint rituals and endorsement ledgers stay current.

orientation.purpose: Provide a fast orientation through the wissenschaftsprojekt Metaquest storyline.

alignment.description: Bridge dashboard linking system + campaign compasses.
Full campaign beacon with assets, gaps, and implementation lattice.

lanterns.title: Manuskriptfinalisierung & Kampagnenstart
lanterns.resonance_role: Defines readiness checklist for publication, endorsements, outreach, and simulator cadence.

notes.logistic_coupling: Cross off checkpoints before announcing Metaquest milestones.

lanterns.title: UTAC Status Matrix
lanterns.resonance_role: Records activation gaps and ΔAIC/null comparisons for campaign readiness.

notes.logistic_coupling: Consult matrix before altering launch schedule or communications.

lanterns.title: Metaquest Parity Brief
lanterns.resonance_role: Anchors telemetry, simulator playlist, endorsement ledger, and codex hook.

notes.logistic_coupling: Ensure mq-parity-001…004 fields filled before releasing outward assets.

lanterns.title: BreakPoint Rituals
lanterns.resonance_role: WayToGo & ReaktionWayToGo outline outreach response + recovery plays.

notes.logistic_coupling: Re-run ritual when endorsements or press cadence shifts.

lanterns.title: Outreach & Simulator Hooks
lanterns.resonance_role: Connects planned demos to manuscript figures and parity brief playlist.

notes.logistic_coupling: Storyboard must link to parity brief and UTAC matrix before press release.

lanterns.title: Shadow Compass Coupling
lanterns.resonance_role: Mirrors risks (endorsement lag, outreach drift) and recovery rituals.

notes.logistic_coupling: Review whenever campaign cadence changes to pre-empt shadow triggers.

pending_vectors.description: Document simulator demo playlist with manuscript + outreach cross-references.

guardrails.Theta: Playlist referenced in parity brief and manuscript figure captions.
guardrails.null_model: Launch assets diverge; demos misalign with narrative.

pending_vectors.description: Compile endorsement & ethics ledger specific to Metaquest activation.

guardrails.Theta: Ledger updated within 14 days; codex entry cites endorsements.

pending_vectors.description: Integrate ArchivSucheUTAC references into campaign materials and parity brief appendices.

guardrails.Theta: Archive lineage cited before external publication.

activation_hooks.response: Update compass tri-layer, log codex entry with mq-sci gaps, sync bridge dashboard.
Verify parity brief citation, cross-link simulator demos, consult shadow compass.
Activate BreakPoint ritual, freeze announcements, update UTAC matrix + codex.

null_model.description: Metaquest narrative advances without parity brief citations or BreakPoint rituals.
risks: Outreach commitments outpace readiness; endorsements lag.
Simulator demos drift from manuscript storyline.
Shadow alerts escalate late, forcing emergency comms rewrites.
